name: All Embed – Elementor Addons
author: bPlugins

sections.description:
All Embed Addon For Elementor is a collection of powerful audio, video, social media widgets that works perfectly with Elementor page builder. It has 20 plus widgets so you can easy-to-use elements those were designed to make your next WordPress page.
Embed anything you want,

Usage

  • Online document: https://elementoraddons.org/docs/documentation/

Feedback

Liked that plugin? Hate it? Want a new feature? [Send me some feedback](mailto: support@bplugins.com “Send feedback”)

‚≠ê Checkout our other WordPress Plugins-

üî• Html5 Audio Player ‚Äì Best audio player plugin for WordPress.

üî• Html5 Video Player ‚Äì Best video player plugin for WordPress.

üî• PDF Poster ‚Äì A fully-featured PDF Viewer Plugin for WordPresss.

üî• StreamCast ‚Äì A fully-featured Radio Player Plugin for WordPresss.

üî• 3D Viewer ‚Äì Display interactive 3D models on the webs.
sections.installation:
Download the latest version of All Embed Addons For Elementor (.zip file)
In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add New
Select ‚ÄúUpload Plugin‚Äù
After Install The Plugin, Just Active It And Use it Smoothly

Note: This plugin works with Elementor. Make sure you have Elementor installed.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
